00019 #ifndef _POINT3D_H

00037 template<class T>
00038 class CPoint3D
00039 {
00040         protected: // attributes
00042                 T m_x;
00044                 T m_y;
00046                 T m_z;
00047         public: // methods
00049                 CPoint3D();
00051                 CPoint3D(T x,T y,T z);
00053                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D){m_x=P3D.GetX();m_y=P3D.GetY();m_z=P3D.GetZ();}
00055                 CPoint3D(const CPoint3D<T>& P3D);
00057                 ~CPoint3D();
00058 
00060                 template<class POLY> operator CPoint3D<POLY>(){return CPoint3D<POLY>(m_x,m_y,m_z);}
00061 
00064 
00065                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T>& operator=(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D){m_x=P3D.GetX();m_y=P3D.GetY();m_z=P3D.GetZ();return *this;};
00067                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T>& operator+=(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D){m_x+=P3D.GetX();m_y+=P3D.GetY();m_z+=P3D.GetZ();return *this;};
00069                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T>& operator-=(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D){m_x-=P3D.GetX();m_y-=P3D.GetY();m_z-=P3D.GetZ();return *this;};
00072                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T>& operator*=(const POLY& Factor){m_x*=Factor;m_y*=Factor;m_z*=Factor;return *this;}
00075                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T>& operator/=(const POLY& Factor){m_x/=Factor;m_y/=Factor;m_z/=Factor;return *this;}
00077 
00079 
00080                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator==(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const{return ((m_x==P3D.GetX()) && (m_y==P3D.GetY()) && (m_z==P3D.GetZ()));}
00082                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator!=(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const{return ((m_x!=P3D.GetX()) || (m_y!=P3D.GetY()) || (m_z!=P3D.GetZ()));}
00084                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator<(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const{if (m_x==P3D.GetX()){if (m_y==P3D.GetY()){return m_z<P3D.GetZ();}else{return (m_y<P3D.GetY());}}else{return (m_x<P3D.GetX());}}
00086                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator<=(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const{if (m_x==P3D.GetX()){if (m_y==P3D.GetY()){return m_z<=P3D.GetZ();}else{return (m_y<P3D.GetY());}}else{return (m_x<P3D.GetX());}}
00088                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator>(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const{if (m_x==P3D.GetX()){if (m_y==P3D.GetY()){return m_z>P3D.GetZ();}else{return (m_y>P3D.GetY());}}else{return (m_x>P3D.GetX());}}
00090                 template<class POLY> inline bool operator>=(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const{if (m_x==P3D.GetX()){if (m_y==P3D.GetY()){return m_z>=P3D.GetZ();}else{return (m_y>P3D.GetY());}}else{return (m_x>P3D.GetX());}}
00092 
00094 
00095                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T> operator+(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const {return CPoint3D<T>(m_x+P3D.GetX(),m_y+P3D.GetY(),m_z+P3D.GetZ());}
00097                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T> operator-(const CPoint3D<POLY>& P3D) const {return CPoint3D<T>(m_x-P3D.GetX(),m_y-P3D.GetY(),m_z-P3D.GetZ());}
00100                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T> operator*(const POLY& Factor) const {return CPoint3D<T>(m_x*Factor,m_y*Factor,m_z*Factor);}
00103                 template<class POLY> inline CPoint3D<T> operator/(const POLY& Factor) const {return CPoint3D<T>(m_x/Factor,m_y/Factor,m_z/Factor);}
00105 
00107                 friend CPoint3D<T> operator*(const T& Factor,const CPoint3D& P3D){return CPoint3D<T>(P3D.m_x*Factor, P3D.m_y*Factor, P3D.m_z*Factor);}
00108

00115                 inline void AddY(const T y);
00117                 inline void AddZ(const T z);
00119                 inline void Sub(const T x, const T y, const T z);

00125                 inline void SubZ(const T z);

00133                 inline T GetZ() const;

00137                 inline void SetX(const T x);
00139                 inline void SetY(const T y);
00141                 inline void SetZ(const T z);
00145                 inline bool IsZero() const;
00153                 inline bool IsZero(T Zero) const;
00157                 inline CPoint3D<T>& ZeroAdjust(const T& Zero);
00161                 inline double GetDist(const CPoint3D<T>& P3D=CPoint3D<T>(0,0,0)) const;
00172                 inline void Rotate(double RadA, double RadB);
00173 
00174                 // info methods
00176                 void Print() const;
00180                 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& s,const CPoint3D<T>& P3D){return s << "(" << P3D.m_x << "," << P3D.m_y << "," << P3D.m_z << ")";}
00181 
00188                 friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, CPoint3D<T>& P3D)
00189                 {
00190                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00191                         is.get(); // eat '('
00192                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00193                         is >> P3D.m_x;
00194                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00195                         is.get(); // eat ','
00196                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00197                         is >> P3D.m_y;
00198                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00199                         is.get(); // eat ','
00200                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00201                         is >> P3D.m_z;
00202                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00203                         is.get(); // eat ')'
00204                         return is;
00205                 }
00206 
00207                 
00216                 std::istream& operator<<(std::istream& s);
00218         protected: // methods
00221                 static inline void SkipSpaceAndComments(std::istream& s)
00222                 {
00223                         while(isspace(s.peek()))
00224                                 s.get();
00225                         while (s.peek()=='#')
00226                         {
00227                                 s.ignore(std::numeric_limits<int>::max(),'\n');
00228                                 while (isspace(s.peek()))
00229                                         s.get();
00230                         }
00231                 }
00232 };

00239 template <class T>
00240 inline void CPoint3D<T>::Add(const T x, const T y, const T z)
00241 {
00242         m_x +=x;
00243         m_y +=y;
00244         m_z +=z;
00245 }

00273         m_z -= z;

00299 {

00355 template <class T>
00356 inline bool CPoint3D<T>::IsZero() const
00357 {
00358         return ((m_x==T(0)) && (m_y==T(0)) && (m_z==T(0)));
00359 }
00360 
00361 template <class T>
00362 inline bool CPoint3D<T>::IsZero(T Zero) const
00363 {
00364         return ((m_x<Zero) && (m_x>-Zero) && (m_y<Zero) && (m_y>-Zero) && (m_z<Zero) && (m_z>-Zero));
00365 }
00366 
00367 template <class T>
00368 inline CPoint3D<T>& CPoint3D<T>::ZeroAdjust(const T& Zero)
00369 {
00370         if (m_x<Zero)
00371                 m_x=T(0);
00372         if (m_y<Zero)
00373                 m_y=T(0);
00374         if (m_z<Zero)
00375                 m_z=T(0);
00376         return *this;
00377 }
00378 
00379 template <class T>
00380 inline double CPoint3D<T>::GetDist(const CPoint3D<T>& P3D) const
00381 {
00382         // return distance between two points
00383         T distX= m_x>P3D.GetX() ? m_x-P3D.GetX() : P3D.GetX()-m_x;
00384         T distY= m_y>P3D.GetY() ? m_y-P3D.GetY() : P3D.GetY()-m_y;
00385         T distZ= m_z>P3D.GetZ() ? m_z-P3D.GetZ() : P3D.GetZ()-m_z;
00386         return sqrt(distX*distX+distY*distY+distZ*distZ);
00387 }
00388 
00389 template <class T>
00390 inline void CPoint3D<T>::Rotate(double RadA, double RadB)
00391 {
00392         double cosa=cos(RadA);
00393         double sina=sin(RadA);
00394         double cosb=cos(RadB);
00395         double sinb=sin(RadB);
00396         double x = m_x*cosb + m_z*sinb;
00397         double y = m_x*sinb*sina + m_y*cosa - m_z*cosb*sina;
00398         double z = -m_x*sinb*cosa + m_y*sina + m_z*cosb*cosa;
00399 //      double x = m_x*cosb + m_y*sinb*sina - m_z*sinb*cosa;
00400 //      double y = m_y*cosa + m_z*sina;
00401 //      double z = m_x*sinb - m_y*cosb*sina + m_z*cosb*cosa;
00402         m_x=(T)x;
00403         m_y=(T)y;
00404         m_z=(T)z;
00405 }
